articles.content: Walmart Chief Financial Officer Brett Biggs said shoppers aren't trading down to cheaper brands, buying smaller packages or skipping over discretionary items but they are paying attention to rising p… [+3314 chars]

articles.title: GameStop Stock: NFT Marketplace Could Be A Super Bullish Catalyst - TheStreet
articles.description: GameStop will be launching its NFT marketplace soon. The platform’s success could be a super bullish catalyst for “apes” and traditional investors alike.
articles.content:
GameStop’s NFT marketplace will launch soon according to Robbie Ferguson, co-founder of Immutable X, the company that will be responsible for the platform's technology.
